name: sfw-bluesky
description: A modified Bluesky client with enforced NSFW content filtering

scripts.prepare: git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/bluesky-social/social-app.git temp-social-app && cp -R temp-social-app/* . || true
scripts.apply-changes: mkdir -p src/customization && cp -f custom-files/hard-coded-prefs.ts src/customization/ && cp -f custom-files/ContentHider.tsx src/components/moderation/ && cp -f custom-files/moderation-opts.tsx src/state/preferences/
scripts.build: yarn && yarn apply-changes && cd bskyweb && yarn build
